STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Blue creatures you control are unblockable.

STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then local characteristics = FilteredCard():GetCurrentCharacteristics() if characteristics ~= nil then characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_UNBLOCKABLE, 1 ) end end
